sentence.text: In the framework of this heterogeneity, we report the clinical description of a neonate, first child of consanguineous parents, who had osteoclast-rich osteopetrosis and bone marrow failure in early life, but no other usual classical features of infantile malignant positive regulation of collagen biosynthetic process, such as visual or hearing impairments.

entity.text: positive regulation of collagen biosynthetic process
